Posts.Title: How Many Are We? DivineMrsM kt1966

Posts.Content: Aug 1, 2013 05:21AM crsp34 wrote: Hi, I met a woman who put an iPod amongst many other items in her memory box. It contained videos of precious events, videos of her giving advice, her favorite music, books, etc. that she wanted to pass on. While not everyone can afford to pop in an iPod, I like the idea of making a book of advice and your lists of favorites, or attaching little notes w/ memories to the baby blanket, etc. :)
